transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller to a specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of a spender.

approve.description: Approves a spender to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the caller.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance of a spender by a specified amount.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance of a spender by a specified amount.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given parameters.

destroyBlackFunds.description: Destroys the funds of a blacklisted account.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of a specific address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

isBlacklisted.description: Checks if an address is blacklisted.

isOwner.description: Checks if an address is the owner of the contract.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

owner.description: Returns the address of the contract owner.

pause.description: Pauses the contract, preventing certain functions from being executed.

unpause.description: Unpauses the contract, allowing functions to be executed again.

paused.description: Returns the pause status of the contract.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.
